android.car.user

类 CarUserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.user.CarUserManager

  • public final class CarUserManager
extends CarManagerBase
    API to manage users related to car.

    • 嵌套类概要

      Callback for notifying user switch before switch started.

      use #UserHandleSwitchUiCallback instead.

      CarUserManager.UserLifecycleEvent called after an existing user is removed.

      CarUserManager.UserLifecycleEvent called when the user is starting, for components to initialize any per-user state they maintain for running users.

      CarUserManager.UserLifecycleEvent called after an existing user is stopped.
      static int USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_STOPPING
      CarUserManager.UserLifecycleEvent called when an existing user is stopping, for components to finalize any per-user state they maintain for running users.
      static int USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_SWITCHING
      CarUserManager.UserLifecycleEvent called when switching to a different foreground user, for components that have special behavior for whichever user is currently in the foreground.
      static int USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_UNLOCKED
      CarUserManager.UserLifecycleEvent called after an existing user is unlocked.
      static int USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_UNLOCKING
      CarUserManager.UserLifecycleEvent called when an existing user is in the process of being unlocked.
      static int USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_VISIBLE
      CarUserManager.UserLifecycleEvent called after an existing user becomes visible.

    • 字段详细资料

      • TAG

        public static final java.lang.String TAG

      • USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_STARTING

        public static final int USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_STARTING
        CarUserManager.UserLifecycleEvent called when the user is starting, for components to initialize any per-user state they maintain for running users.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_SWITCHING

        public static final int USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_SWITCHING
        CarUserManager.UserLifecycleEvent called when switching to a different foreground user, for components that have special behavior for whichever user is currently in the foreground.

        This is called before any application processes are aware of the new user.

        Notice that internal system services might not have handled user switching yet, so be careful with interaction with them.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_UNLOCKING

        public static final int USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_UNLOCKING
        CarUserManager.UserLifecycleEvent called when an existing user is in the process of being unlocked.

        This means the credential-encrypted storage for that user is now available, and encryption-aware component filtering is no longer in effect.

        Notice that internal system services might not have handled unlock yet, so most components should ignore this callback and rely on USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_UNLOCKED instead.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_UNLOCKED

        public static final int USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_UNLOCKED
        CarUserManager.UserLifecycleEvent called after an existing user is unlocked.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_POST_UNLOCKED

        public static final int USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_POST_UNLOCKED
        CarUserManager.UserLifecycleEvent called after an existing user is unlocked for components to perform non-urgent tasks for user unlocked.

        Note: This event type is intended only for internal system services. Application listeners should not use this event type and will not receive any events of this type.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_STOPPING

        public static final int USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_STOPPING
        CarUserManager.UserLifecycleEvent called when an existing user is stopping, for components to finalize any per-user state they maintain for running users.

        This is called prior to sending the SHUTDOWN broadcast to the user; it is a good place to stop making use of any resources of that user (such as binding to a service running in the user).

        Note: this is the last callback where the callee may access the target user's CE storage.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_STOPPED

        public static final int USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_STOPPED
        CarUserManager.UserLifecycleEvent called after an existing user is stopped.

        This is called after all application process teardown of the user is complete.

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_CREATED

        public static final int USER_LIFECYCLE_EVENT_TYPE_CREATED
        CarUserManager.UserLifecycleEvent called after an existing user is created.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

        参数:

        返回:

      • setUserSwitchUiCallback

        @Deprecated
public void setUserSwitchUiCallback(CarUserManager.UserSwitchUiCallback callback)
        已过时。 use setUserSwitchUiCallback(Executor, UserHandleSwitchUiCallback) instead.
        Sets a callback to be notified before user switch. It should only be used by Car System UI.

      • setUserSwitchUiCallback

        public void setUserSwitchUiCallback(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor,
                                    CarUserManager.UserHandleSwitchUiCallback callback)
        Sets a callback to be notified before user switch.

        It should only be used by Car System UI. Setting this callback will notify the Car System UI to show the user switching dialog.

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase

      • lifecycleEventTypeToString

        public static java.lang.String lifecycleEventTypeToString(int type)

      • isValidUser

        @Deprecated
public boolean isValidUser(int userId)
        已过时。 use isValidUser(UserHandle) instead.
        Checks if the given userId represents a valid user.

        A "valid" user:

        • Must exist in the device.
        • Is not in the process of being deleted.
        • Cannot be the system user on devices that use headless system user mode.

      • isValidUser

        public boolean isValidUser(UserHandle userHandle)
        Checks if the given userHandle represents a valid user.

        A "valid" user:

        • Must exist in the device.
        • Is not in the process of being deleted.
        • Cannot be the system user on devices that use headless system user mode.
